id: < Identifier for configuration. E.g., Team Falcon, Team Nighthawk, Marketing >
channels: < channel to report summaries, sans the leading '#'. E.g. team-channel-name >
tz: < Timezone for notification date/times. See http://momentjs.com/timezone for more details. E.g. America/New_York >

schedules.day: Must be a number representing the day of week. E.g. 0 (Sunday) or 6 (Saturday)
schedules.hour: Must be a number representing the hour of the day. Military time. 0-23
schedules.minute: Must be a number representing the minute of the hour. 0-59

questions: < What did you get work on... ? Note order is preserved >

members.color: A hexidecimal color that will identify each user's summary in the channel. E.g. #00FF00
